entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 90S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
